text: Madison Parish (French: Paroisse de Madison) is a parish located on the northeastern border of the U.S. state of Louisiana. It is in the delta lowlands along the Mississippi River. As of the 2020 census, the population was 10,017. Its parish seat is Tallulah. The parish was formed in 1839. ==References== Category:1830s establishments in Louisiana Category:1839 establishments in the United States
title: Madison Parish, Louisiana
